name: companies_id_jobs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool german_company_data_v2.
Tool description: Enrich your CRM / MAS / ERP system with credible data about all incorporated companies from  Germany.
API description: This endpoint returns the latest job postings about the company with the given identifier since the given timestamp. This timestamp is optional and is specified via a query parameter. Job postings come with a title, a text (the content of the posting), a source, and a timestamp.

since.description: A timestamp to filter job postings. Defaults to '2017-01-01'.

size.description: The maximum number of job postings to return. Defaults to 100.
